name: Pace Yourself
description:
Controls are wasd/arrow keys, space to jump and you later unlock abilities on left shift and left control.

Pace Yourself was created in 2012 for the Norwegian Nationals of Gameplay, a game jam competition hosted by the Norwegian Film Institute. The theme of the competition was "speed" and this game was the winning entry. As the game has been dusting away on my hard drive I thought it would be fun to make it accessible on itch for posterity.

Thanks to Paal B. Solhaug for the music!
